#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int l=s.length(),flag=0;
        for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
            if((s[i]=='a')||(s[i]=='e')||(s[i]=='i')||(s[i]=='o')||(s[i]=='u'))
            {
                cout<<"yes\n";
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==0)
        {
            cout<<"no\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
